title: thandaruL aiyaa
sahitya:
tandaruL ayyA kandanE nI meyyagha



anupallavi



cintanai shakti sheyal ellAm shelutti (en) undanaiyenatti UyndiDav  shei
bhakti



caraNam



dEshikha maNi nI tEjOmayan n  vAca kavikunjaradAsaka vAsan nI
mA sukha bhASiNi nAsikAbhUSaNi mAshilA karpu mAmaNi bAlan nI
